title: Implement /auth/meta/callback
description:
Handle OAuth callback, exchange code for token.

## Implementation
```python
import httpx

@router.get("/meta/callback")
async def meta_callback(code: str):
    async with httpx.AsyncClient() as client:
        response = await client.get(
            "https://graph.facebook.com/v19.0/oauth/access_token",
            params={
                "client_id": settings.meta_app_id,
                "client_secret": settings.meta_app_secret,
                "redirect_uri": settings.meta_redirect_uri,
                "code": code
            }
        )
        token_data = response.json()
        
        # Store token (in-memory for hackathon)
        # In production: encrypt and store in DB
        
        return RedirectResponse(
            url=f"/dashboard?token={token_data['access_token']}"
        )
```

## Token Storage
- Hackathon: In-memory or session
- Production: Encrypted in database with refresh flow
